name: Clockwork Tactician
description: The Clockwork Tactician is a Medium-sized Construct known for its strategic combat abilities and high intelligence. It features durable natural armor and is designed for battlefield control, making it a commanding presence in combat.
memorable: Its ability to analyze threats and coordinate allies makes it a unique battlefield strategist that enhances the effectiveness of its companions.
goals: To effectively control the battlefield and support allies in combat situations through tactical commands.
relations: Often encountered alongside allied constructs and creatures that benefit from its strategic guidance.
environment: Can usually be found in advanced mechanized realms or battlefields where strategy plays a crucial role.
strengths: High intelligence and strength allow it to command the battlefield, along with magical resistance and immunity to many conditions.
weaknesses: Limited mobility with only walking speed and dependency on allies for maximizing its effectiveness through Pack Tactics.
attacks: Can execute four Multiweapon attacks, adjusting damage types based on the situation.
most_powerful_ability: Quick Study allows it to gain advantageous benefits after being attacked, enabling potent reactions during combat.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 120 feet and a passive perception score of 16.
skills: Proficient in perception checks, leveraging its high intelligence for effective reasoning.
additional_information: Immune to poison and psychic damage
Can issue commands to enhance allies' effectiveness
Ability to operate without rest or sustenance
Can stack multiple benefits from Quick Study
test_queries: Clockwork Tactician uses commands for allies
